title: 送给单身狗的的歌single dog
author: a1322274023
txt_content:
Single dog, single dog, single all the day

See AV,  hit the plane

They are doing all the day. Hey!

Single dog, single dog, why don't be a gay?

No more wait, no more afraid

Let you be a gay!
